statement.p: Below is a map of Central New Jersey. Using an inch ruler on the map, you found the distance between Rutgers University Livingston Campus and Robinvale is \displaystyle{1}\frac{{15}}{{16}} inches. Find the actual distance between Rutgers University Livingston Campus and Robinvale.
The actual distance between Rutgers University Livingston Campus and Robinvale is miles.
